lines.text: We can get away from him, but he can't get away from himself.
Mimi... spoiled since childhood, who wants what she wants when she wants it.
Say, Fred, don't you think you're seeing too much of Mrs. Lombard? Going about with a married woman causes gossip?
Turn around, my dear, so your husband can also admire you.
I know Mrs. Lombard is charming - but remember I'm here.
Be careful, Mimi - I might be dangerous.
What a strange thing is Fate! A few brief hours and one's whole life may be changed!
Their love was sweeping them on like a torrent against which they were powerless.
Massa Winship's been shot - they're going to take him to the hospital.
Mimi, you must believe me! I'm going out of his life forever - he will soon forget - forgive him - hold him -...
Why? So that all his life he will be looking at me and thinking of you?
Now insignificant are the plans of men against an all powerful Destiny that summons even the elements to do its bidding.
